1.text: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron: the firstborn, Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess;

2.text: the third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith;

3.text: the fifth, Shephatiah of Abital; the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.

4.text: six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

5.text: and these were born unto him in Jerusalem: Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath-shua the daughter of Ammiel:

6.text: and Ibhar, and Elishama, and Eliphelet;

7.text: and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia;

8.text: and Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

9.text: All these were the sons of David; beside the sons of the concubines; and Tamar was their sister.

10.text: And Solomonâ€™s son was Rehoboam, Abijah his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son;

11.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son;

12.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son;

13.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son;

14.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.

15.text: And the sons of Josiah; the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

16.text: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

17.text: And the sons of Jeconiah, the captive; Shealtiel his son,

18.text: and Malchiram, and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

19.text: And the sons of Pedaiah; Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah; and Shelomith was their sister:

20.text: and Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.

21.text: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jeshaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shecaniah.

22.text: And the sons of Shecaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

23.text: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hizkiah, and Azrikam, three.

24.text: And the sons of Elioenai; Hodaviah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
